import React from "react"; import Modal from './Modal' import Link from 'next/link' function reducer(state, action) { switch (action.type) { case 'MAP': return !state.map; case 'DELETE': return !state.delete;; default: state; } } const PlaceItem = ({ title, image, address, description, creatorId, coordinates, id }) => { // const [state, setState] = React.useState(false) const [state, dispatch] = React.useReducer(reducer, {map:false,delete:false}) return (
